title: Business Networking Breakfast
description: Connect with local entrepreneurs over coffee and breakfast. Bring business cards!

title: Digital Marketing Workshop
description: Learn how to grow your business online with SEO, social media, and email campaigns.

title: Chamber Annual Gala
description: Celebrate local business achievements with dinner, awards, and entertainment.

title: Startup Pitch Night
description: Watch local startups pitch their ideas to investors and mentors.

title: Women in Business Luncheon
description: Empowering women entrepreneurs with networking and guest speakers.

title: Local Vendor Market Day
description: Support local vendors and artisans. Food trucks, crafts, and live music.

title: Youth Career Expo
description: High school students meet employers, explore career paths, and attend resume workshops.
